name: The Assessment (LD50)
description:
Kneel before the Supreme Leader of the Galactic Federation!

It has come to our attention that you are beyond ungrateful for the life you have been given on this puny planet. On this day, you stand trial for the unforgivable crimes you have committed.

But ah, you are in luck, for the gods of graciousness have granted you a boon! We shall forgive your atrocious sins, if... you succeed in completing these simple tasks!

The Assessment is a collection of quick and hectic minigames, made in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 50! Complete the tasks the aliens have given you to hold back their plans to destroy the earth. Crack the safe, scramble the eggs, sweep the mines, and remember to stay hydrated!

Made by Carl Lenngren, Erik Schröder and Ulf Malmberg
